entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,582Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 65

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort.Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad.Heavily inspired by Batman/Superman The Animated Series, Justice League, & Justice League Unlimited. Also takes inspiration from The Batman (2022), My Adventures With Superman (2023), and Batman: Caped Crusader (2024), and Smallville (2001).

entry.title: Both Haunted and Holy
entry.summary:
Author: Anselbun

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,903Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 29

Summary: Bruce Wayne is a large man- thats evident even when sitting in a tiny cell. Broad shouldered, with a sharp jaw. Even sharper eyes, that follow every movement as Clark settles in the chair and sifts through a few papers. If Clark focuses his senses, he can tell many more things about Bruce- that his body is covered in a litter of scars, both large and small. That his heartbeat is still steady and even, focused but calm. If he uses his x-ray vision, he can tell that its been probably seven hours since Bruce has eaten, but of course Clark doesn‚Äôt do that. That would be weird.And a thing Clark definitely doesn‚Äôt notice about Bruce Wayne is how handsome he is. If it weren‚Äôt for the Arkham jumpsuit, the ear-length shaggy hair, and the light coat of stubble, you could still imagine him as the charming Gotham rich boy he was meant to be.But he isn‚Äôt. He‚Äôs not Bruce Wayne, billionaire orphan anymore. Now, he‚Äôs Bruce Wayne, mass murderer, with thirty-six known victims.a world where Bruce Wayne didn't become Batman, and tried to fix Gotham in a different way. Au by @Frownyalfred on tumblr

entry.title: And I don't wanna go home yet
entry.summary:
Author: LuiGarMir

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,000Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 33

Summary: When Clark met Bruce, he didn‚Äôt think much of the man. Well, no. He‚Äôd had thoughts‚Äîa lot of them having to do with his chiseled jaw and strong shoulders‚Äîbut he hadn‚Äôt seen past Batman‚Äôs dark, gloomy, unknowable persona.The man‚Äîbarely a young adult when they met‚Äîhad been polite and deadly efficient, but also cold and distant.Clark, a journalist at heart, wanted to know more about him, but Superman understood how precious secrecy and privacy were. So‚Ä¶ He gave Batman some space.It took him years to discover the man‚Äôs civilian name. And it just so happened to be around the same time both men started getting closer. Or it was maybe the reason why they got close at all.

entry.title: a place to land
entry.summary:
Author: mikaminato

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,651Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 55

Summary: "Clark? What's wrong?" He asks quietly, reaching out to rest a bandaged hand against Clark's shoulder.Clark smiles, soft and a little sad."Nothing. I just... I'm glad you're here, Bruce," he says, and hopes his voice is steady. The words are honest, despite how inadequate they seem, but he can tell Bruce is reassured by them. His posture relaxes, the tension in his jaw eases, and his grip tightens, just a fraction, on Clark's shoulder.

And beside, not like she can pass on the chance to attend Gotham University with free tuition thanks to grants and scholarship. So, it's time for Reyna to experience the wild Gotham City and potentially get herself into some shenanigans. At least there are bats and birds around to save the day.

entry.title: Sway
entry.summary:
Author: fuckleef

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,566Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Clark‚Äôs eyes scanned the crowd, looking for, hopefully, a dancer to focus on. And there he was. A tall, dark haired one. He seemed to dance with a woman, but she obviously was struggling to keep up with the dancer. He was looking at her intensively, like he was taken by the music. The way he moved was smooth, fluid. He seemed to float, rather than just stepping around in rhythm. It was a nice thing to watch. It felt resting, comfortable for Clark.
